overview: Russ Campanello brings more than 20 years of human resources leadership in the high-technology sector to iRobot. He is responsible for developing the companyâ€™s human resources strategy and implementing practices that maintain and enhance the companyâ€™s ability to attract and develop the talent necessary to support future growth. Before joining iRobot, Campanello served as senior vice president of human resources and administration at Phase Forward, Inc., a data management solutions provider for clinical trials and drug safety. Previously, he held senior management positions at Keane, Inc. and NerveWire, Inc. Campanello holds a bachelor of science degree in business administration from the University of Massachusetts.

relationships.title: Senior Vice President of Human Resources
